<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 300, 243, 315]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 355, 395, 370]]<|/det|>
You must answer on the question paper.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 384, 400, 399]]<|/det|>
You will need: Geometrical instruments  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 418, 222, 433]]<|/det|>
## INSTRUCTIONS  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 435, 858, 621]]<|/det|>
INSTRUCTIONS- Answer all questions.- Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.- Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page.- Write your answer to each question in the space provided.- Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid.- Do not write on any bar codes.- You should use a calculator where appropriate.- You may use tracing paper.- You must show all necessary working clearly.- Give non-exact numerical answers correct to 3 significant figures, or 1 decimal place for angles in degrees, unless a different level of accuracy is specified in the question.- For \(\pi\), use either your calculator value or 3.142.  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 650, 213, 664]]<|/det|>
## INFORMATION  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 666, 730, 698]]<|/det|>
INFORMATION- The total mark for this paper is 130.- The number of marks for each question or part question is shown in brackets [ ].

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 71, 618, 89]]<|/det|>
A company makes scientific calculators and graphic calculators.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 85, 658, 104]]<|/det|>
Each day they make \(x\) scientific calculators and \(y\) graphic calculators.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 116, 868, 135]]<|/det|>
These inequalities describe the number of scientific and graphic calculators they make each day.

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 147, 510, 166]]<|/det|>
\[x< 180\qquad y\leqslant 90\qquad x + y\leqslant 240\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 180, 144, 199]]<|/det|>
<label>(a)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 180, 403, 199]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 210, 774, 229]]<|/det|>
The company makes fewer than .................... scientific calculators each day.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 240, 747, 259]]<|/det|>
The company can make a maximum of .................... calculators each day.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[890, 241, 918, 259]]<|/det|>
<mark>[2]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 272, 144, 290]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 303, 660, 322]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 335, 368, 352]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[880, 428, 910, 445]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[232, 101, 767, 120]]<|/det|>
\[x< 180\qquad y\leqslant 90\qquad x + y\leqslant 240\qquad 2x + 3y\geqslant 450\]
